synopsis.text:
This anime, a continuation of The New Prince of Tennis series, takes us back to the U-17 High School Representatives Selection Camp. The narrative unfolds as the Foreign Expedition Team, comprising 20 formidable players, returns after a month-long tour. Their homecoming stirs up tension as the coaches announce a selection process for the top 20 players to undergo further training. The middle school students, feeling sidelined, challenge the players holding the 11th to 20th positions in a bid to seize their spots.

The plot thickens with the delayed arrival of the 'Genius 10,' prompting the middle school students to devise strategies to claim these coveted positions. Unconventional alliances form as they strive to outwit and outplay the nation's top 10 players. The stakes are high, with the ultimate prize being a chance to represent Japan at the U-17 World Cup.

Amidst the intense competition, our protagonist, Ryoma Echizen, finds himself in the crosshairs of the No. 1 player. However, an unexpected ally steps in, revealing a surprising identity. The series is a thrilling blend of strategy, skill, and suspense, promising a riveting journey in the world of tennis.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
